entry.title: The Carpentries Instructor Training
entry.content:
I have signed up to be trained as a certified Carpentry instructor and it has been wonderful learning experience so far. I received this information from Coderefinery and there are more upcoming online instructor trainings this fall. If you are:

  1. in Nordics or Estonia,
  2. can attend the training on October 18-21, 4 hours in evening check your local time without any absence, and
  3. agree with the conditions to take the training (refer https://amy.carpentries.org/forms/request_training/)

reach out to

https://coderefinery.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/300025-carpentries/topic/Announcement.20of.20new.20upcoming.20instructor.20trainings

to help you through the process. This priority would expire soon as NeIC's membership of the Carpentries expire at the end of October.

entry.title: GitHub - ashwinvis/ashwinvis-micropub
entry.content:
Compared to last time I tried it (a year or two ago), now the IndieKit project has matured and is fairly well documented. I have deployed my micropub server to allow for effortless micro blogging to my Pelican blog.

Since Pelican style metadata was not available, I had to implement it. I learned a bit of NodeJS development in the process - it was not easy.
